title: The Red Badger of Courage
description: Doers of bad deeds don’t stand a chance against the Red Badger of Courage!
quote: Don’t try this at home, Badger Buddies.
altHero: the Red Badger of Courage superhero
alt1: the Red Badger of Courage is hanging on to the back of a small airplane
alt2: the guy flying the plane leaps from the cockpit
alt3: the Red Badger of Courage jumps and follows
alt4: the Red Badger of Courage catches up to the guy in the air and grabs him
